metadata.dc:author: Las Heras, J
metadata.dc:description: The purpose of this review is to call attention on the participation of the placenta in intrauterine infections. The importance of a prompt recognition of the latter and the value of the placental examination to the understanding of such problems affecting the fetus and the newborn are emphasized.
metadata.dc:title: Patología placentaria e infección perinatal.
[Placental pathology and perinatal infection].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
